item.description:
Join us as we discuss the novel The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo by Stieg Larsson.

A spellbinding amalgam of murder mystery, family saga, love story, and financial intrigue.

We will meet in the cafe area at the front of the store and will place a copy of the book on the table so that new people can more easily find us.

Feel free to bring suggestions for our next book.

You can see past books selected by this group here: http://www.goodreads....
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the cafe area and place a copy of the book on the table.
item.name: South Shore Readers: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
